name: The Thousand-Year Dragon
description:
The Thousand-Year Dragon tells the story of an ancient legend that is about to come true as a fearsome dragon awakens to rule the world once again, and a warrior awakens to prevent it once again.

===================================================== 

Instructions

W A S D - Movement
Left-Click - Attack
Spacebar - Jump
E - Interact
P - Pause
